name: Move to end of line
description: Move cursor to the end of the line
hint: Use $ to jump to the end of the line

name: Move to start of line
description: Move cursor to the beginning of the line
hint: Use 0 to jump to the start of the line, or ^ to jump to the first non-whitespace character

name: Navigate to word
hint: Use w to move forward by words. Try counting: how many w's to reach 'brown'?

name: Add exclamation
description: Add an exclamation mark at the end
hint: Use A to append at the end of the line, type !, then press Esc

name: Delete a word
hint: Navigate to 'lazy' with w, then use dw to delete the word. Move to the end with $

name: Change word
hint: Using cw is a bit faster than dw since it clears the word and puts you in insert mode

name: Move backwards by word
description: Move cursor backwards to the word 'quick'
hint: Use b to move backwards by words. Count how many times you need to press b

name: Move to end of word
description: Move cursor to the end of the word 'The'
hint: Use e to move to the end of the current word

name: Navigate down lines
description: Move cursor down to the 'return' line
hint: Use j to move down lines, then use w or ^ to position the cursor correctly

starting:

hint: Use G (capital G) to jump to the last line
